unnormalised: Looks like that courier mix-up near my house is finally getting sorted out! Remember how everyone in Sector 40 was getting each other's Amazon deliveries? Turns out, the local Blue Dart branch at Shop No. 12, Main Market, Sector 40, Gurgaon, 122001 had a whole system failure. Packages were being mis-sorted left, right, and centre.
normalised: Looks like that courier mix-up near my house is finally getting sorted out! Remember how everyone in Sector forty was getting each other's Amazon deliveries? Turns out, the local Blue Dart branch at Shop Number twelve, Main Market, Sector forty, Gurgaon, one two two zero zero one had a whole system failure. Packages were being mis-sorted left, right, and centre.

unnormalised: Apparently, it all started around 15/07/2024, right after that massive monsoon downpour. Water damage to the sorting machines is being blamed. Several residents complained on Twitter; addresses like "H. No. 56, Lane 3, Sector 40" were showing up as delivered but nobody at those houses had received anything.
normalised: Apparently, it all started around fifteenth july two thousand and twenty four, right after that massive monsoon downpour. Water damage to the sorting machines is being blamed. Several residents complained on Twitter; addresses like "House Number fifty six, Lane three, Sector forty" were showing up as delivered but nobody at those houses had received anything.

unnormalised: The courier company's regional head, Mr. Rajesh Kumar, addressed the situation saying that they've added more manpower to specifically re-sort the misplaced items and improve their delivery accuracy. They are hoping to get the system back on track within 7 days, hopefully by the 28/07/2024.
normalised: The courier company's regional head, Mister Rajesh Kumar, addressed the situation saying that they've added more manpower to specifically re-sort the misplaced items and improve their delivery accuracy. They are hoping to get the system back on track within seven days, hopefully by the twenty eighth july two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Folks in Sector 40 are crossing their fingers (and checking their tracking apps every 5 mins, lol) that their long-awaited online shopping hauls, addressed to "Flat No. 201, ABC Apartments, Sector 40, Gurgaon" or similar, will finally arrive. Guess we will see if this resolves itself soon!
normalised: Folks in Sector forty are crossing their fingers (and checking their tracking apps every five minutes, laugh out loud) that their long-awaited online shopping hauls, addressed to "Flat Number two zero one, A-B-C Apartments, Sector forty, Gurgaon" or similar, will finally arrive. Guess we will see if this resolves itself soon!
